mapper.sql: id, user_uid, course_uid, section_id, end_time_point, is_completed, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time

select rclh.id, rclh.user_uid, rclh.course_uid, rclh.section_id, rclh.end_time_point, rclh.is_completed, rclh.create_by, rclh.create_time, rclh.last_update_by, rclh.last_update_time from roncoo_course_learn_history as rclh
